title: Liam and the Grump
description: When Liam's father tells him to control his temper Liam goes one step further and pulls his temper right out of him. Unfortunately Liam's temper doesn't want to be controlled and would rather have fun. Follow Liam and the Grump through the mayhem as he tries to get it back under control. A fun story for all ages showing how we all can struggle to control our temper.
author: Graham Austin-King
